text: Catherine Lucy Hawking (born 2 November 1970) is an English journalist, novelist, educator, and philanthropist. She is the daughter of the late theoretical physicist Stephen Hawking and writer Jane Wilde Hawking. She lives in London, and is best known as a children's novelist and science educator. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:English children's writers Category:English journalists Category:English novelists
title: Lucy Hawking
